CustomField.description: Include details & calculations, e.g. income shortfalls, adhoc spending, general reasoning and cash available for other advice. Guidance for house views can be found in planner manual (Cash reserve).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Include details & calculations, e.g. income shortfalls, adhoc spending, general reasoning and cash available for other advice. Guidance for house views can be found in planner manual (Cash reserve).
CustomField.label: Spending and saving
